name: psybeam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Fires a peculiar ray that may confuse the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Fires a peculiar ray that may confuse the foe.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A peculiar ray is shot at the foe. It may leave the foe confused.
